dcterms:creator: R. Duan
H. Deng
M. Tian
Y. Deng
J. Lin
dcterms:description: The SODA dataset is an image dataset in VOC format, containing 19,846 images and annotations for 286,201 objects. It includes 15 categories: slogan, fence, hook, hopper, electric box, cutter, handcart, scaffold, brick, rebar, wood, board, helmet, vest, and person, covering the most common objects found on construction sites.
dcterms:title: SODA

dcterms:creator: A. Xuehui
Z. Li
L. Zuguang
W. Chengzhi
L. Pengfei
L. Zhiwei
dcterms:description: The MOCS dataset is a large-scale image dataset for detecting moving objects in construction sites. It comprises 41,668 images with annotations for 13 categories of objects, including worker, tower crane, hanging hook, vehicle crane, roller, bulldozer, excavator, truck, loader, pump truck, concrete transport mixer, pile driver, and other vehicles.
dcterms:title: MOCS

dcterms:creator: X. Yan
H. Zhang
Y. Wu
C. Lin
S. Liu
dcterms:description: The CIS dataset is a novel image dataset designed to advance state-of-the-art instance segmentation in the field of construction management. It contains 50,000 images with 10 object categories, including workers wearing and not wearing safety helmets, precast components, and various types of construction machinery.
dcterms:title: CIS
